movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman, with the help of his allies and Gotham's police, tries to rid the city of crime.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story depicts several decades in the life of Forrest Gump, a slow-witted but kind-hearted and athletically-talented man.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: Various interconnected stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
